title: Loops and Loots with Loop Hero
description: Just one more loop? The boys jump into the indie darling that's got the nation abuzz: Loop Hero. They also dive into some more review songs and explore whether Griffin and his computer are best friends.
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (The Besties)
